data.title: 20th Century Fox Movies Index
data.meta_description: 20th Century Fox movies by letter and by year
data.text:
The table below lists the top-grossing 20th Century Fox movie released in each calendar year (based on worldwide box office). Click on the year number for a list of all the 20th Century Fox films released that year. The "Annual Stats" links will take you to a summary of the domestic film business for 20th Century Fox movies for the year in question (this part of our archive starts in 1995). Click on the movie name to see information on the individual film.

YearAnnual

StatsTotal

MoviesAverage

Production

BudgetCombined

Worldwide
